page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: Noke and Islip both have big playing fields and there are good country walks especially on Otmoor.The three tennis courts in Islip are privately owned.Jogging is a popular keep fit pastime.Islip supports two football clubs,a cricket club,a youth club,an old age pensioners club,a British Legion Branch, and an amateur dramatic group called the Islip Players.The clubs are well supported and there is a full programme of cricket and football matches every year.The Islip Players attract amateur actors from the whole area,and from outside it as well,and their performances are always fully booked.There is a children's playground in Islip with swings and climbing frames,and children also use the school playground.For other games people have to go to the sports centre in Kidlington or elsewhere.
